channel.title: timelapse on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in timelapse on David Amador

item.title: Dary's Legend development Timelapse sample
item.description: Working on Dary’s Legend has been my daily routine so I decided to make a time lapse. So this is a video compiled using Chronolapse, by taking a screenshot every 60s during a couple of days while I’m working on Dary’s Legend, the new game from Different Pixel. The video is being played back at 10 real minutes per second. This was recorded between 14-06-2012 and 30-06-2012 (some days are missing)
item.content:encoded:
Working on Dary’s Legend has been my daily routine so I decided to make a time lapse.

So this is a video compiled using Chronolapse, by taking a screenshot every 60s during a couple of days while I’m working on Dary’s Legend, the new game from Different Pixel. The video is being played back at 10 real minutes per second.

This was recorded between 14-06-2012 and 30-06-2012 (some days are missing)
